content: Write a banner ad for a back pain remedy. Make it no more than five sentences and follow the problem-agitate-solution framework.  Include a call to action asking the reader to click on a link within the ad so they can purchase the remedy.

chosen: Are you tired of living in constant pain? Are you sick of taking pills that only give temporary relief? Well, now there's a solution! Introducing [insert product name here], the all natural way to eliminate your back pain. With [insert product name here] you will experience fast acting results that last. No more suffering through the day or losing sleep at night because of your discomfort. Say goodbye to expensive doctor visits and dangerous prescription drugs. Click the link below to order your very own [insert product name here] today!
rejected: Are you tired of living with constant back pain? Well, now is your chance to do something about it! Our all-natural back pain remedy has helped hundreds of people just like you find relief from their chronic back pain. Our customers are saying things like, "I was skeptical at first, but after trying this product I'm a believer!" and "This stuff really works!" Don't wait any longer to feel better. Click here to buy some today!
